about.brief_profile: Having previously studied electrical & biomedical engineering, I now develop and apply tools to study the structural connections of the brain. My primary research focus is on the short-ranged, "U"-shaped connections that join nearby brain regions. I am also a supporter of open science and all things open source.
about.polaroid_caption: In my spare time, I enjoy travelling to new places and taking in the scenic views
about.code_caption: I utilize a number of programming languages, software containers, & CI/CD when tackling projects
about.research_caption: Magnetic resonance imaging, used to acquire images of the brain, is one of the primary tools I use as part of my research in studying it's structural connectivity
